description: The ED_OTHER_STATUS table contains information about ED patients' "other" status. One row in this table corresponds to one ED "other" status change. If a patient's ED "other" status is changed five times in a single encounter, this table will contain five rows for that encounter.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the Inpatient Data Store record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to PAT_ENC_HSP.INPATIENT_DATA_ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this status. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ED_OTHR_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the ED other status for the ED encounter. This can include statuses like "Bed Assigned" or "Transportation Called."


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Order Placed


Order Sent


Order Received


Order Resulted


Order Completed


Reg Start


Reg Completed


Reg Needed


Financial Counselor Required


Ready for Financial Counselor


Financial Counselor Finished

columns.name: OTHR_STATUS_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when the ED other status was set. This can include statuses like "Bed Assigned" or "Transportation Called."

columns.name: OTHR_STATUS_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who is associated with this status change. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI). This column is frequently used to link to PAT_ENC_HSP.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID.
